forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 13C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 56F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers during the evening will give way to steady rain overnight. Low 46F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
